eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Texas; AT 02:44 AM ON OCT 01, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:59 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: AMBER Alert: Child Abduction from Grapevine, TX. Suspect vehicle is a white Ford F 150 pickup. Missing child: Kaylin Rickards, 13 year old black female, last seen wearing a black hoodie with a black tank top underneath, black sweatpants, and pink Crocs. If seen call 9 1 1.
